entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023
